Body:
with patch('owmeta.configure.resource_filename') as rf:
    with patch.dict('os.environ', (), clear=True):
        rf.return_value = 'moosh'
        tf = self.tempfile()
        print('{"z": "$BASE/car"}', file=tf)
        tf.close()
        try:
            c = Configure.open(tf.name)
            self.assertEqual(c['z'], 'moosh/car')
        finally:
            os.unlink(tf.name)
